data.feedback: Plan covers all 9 required epics with 80 detailed stories. Perfect API coherence with backend (all endpoints match). Clean architecture properly applied. Minor issue: iOS/Android platform files listed as filesToModify when directories don't exist yet, but this won't block implementation.
issues: Epic 2 filesToModify lists platform files that don't exist (iOS/Android folders need to be created first via flutter create)
suggestions: Add note to Epic 1 or 2 that flutter create may need to run first to generate platform folders
Change ios/Runner/Info.plist and android/app/src/main/AndroidManifest.xml from filesToModify to filesToCreate
